about.title: Who I am and how I work
about.who_body: I am a Full Stack Developer focused on frontend (React, Vue and Material UI) with over 4 years of experience building web applications, internal systems, CRUDs, dashboards and API integrations.
about.who_body2: At Miii I worked on the development of the internal backoffice and corporate landings, handling deploys and production maintenance. Later, as a freelance developer, I built landings and applications using React, Angular, Tailwind CSS and other technologies.
about.who_body3: Currently I work at PBS for Telviso, contributing to the development, maintenance and improvement of internal systems using PHP, MySQL, Vue and JS. I build new features, optimize existing modules, create complete CRUDs, integrate internal APIs, work with Docker containers and maintain systems with high-volume production data. I also participate in incident resolution, performance improvements, legacy code refactoring and the creation of functional interfaces used daily by hundreds of internal users.
about.how_body: I enjoy working as a team, building fast, measuring results and constantly optimizing digital products. I prioritize clear communication, iterative deliveries and clean, maintainable code.
